name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ShopGuide: Amazon Shopping Cart AI assistant

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Personal shopping assistant in your Amazon shopping cart: Product description, review scores, pros, cons, summary & comparison chart

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever added more than one Amazon product to the shopping cart to make the final decision later?  Is it hard to decide which product to buy? ShopGuide is your new shopping companion. Our AI-powered extension simplifies your shopping experience by:

1. Comparing key features: Quickly identify differences between similar items.
2. Analyzing customer reviews: Get an instant AI-generated summary of what customers love and hate.  
3. Get alternative product suggestions : Discover products you might not have considered.

Make informed purchasing decisions with ShopGuide!
